alert.note: Alert for Nueces (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 03 at 9:57AM CDT until September 05 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of south Texas, including the following counties, Nueces and San Patricio. * WHEN...Until 1100 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 957 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Corpus Christi, Corpus Christi International Airport, Driscoll Childrens Hospital, La Palmera Mall, Cole Park, Corpus Christi Country Club, Del Mar College Heritage Campus, Spohn Hospital South, Bay Area Medical Center, Cabaniss Field, Texas A&M University Corpus Christi, Downtown Corpus Christi, Del Mar College Windward Campus, Kings Crossing Subdivision, South Texas Botanical Gardens, Corpus Christi North Beach, Flour Bluff, Waldron Field and Corpus Christi Naval Air Station. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
